extends java.lang.Thread

                     boolean terminator)

        player - is the player who has to play the turn
        terminator - is true if the player is playing the terminator mode

      • frenzy

        public void frenzy(Player player,
                   boolean afterFirstPlayer,
                   boolean terminator)
        it allows the player to play his FinalFrenzy turn
        Parameters:
        player - is who has to play the FinalFrenzy turn
        afterFirstPlayer - represents if you play after the first player
        terminator - is true if the player has to perform a frenzy terminator turn

      • run

        public void run()
        This method is used to perform all the types of turn: the first one, the standard one and the frenzy one.
